Text:
I translated the machine subtitles into English actually spoken by humans. The film makes sense now.

This is for 24 FPS video 1hr 55 mins. It should work for this one (runtime is the same). Re-title it to match exactly this title except for .srt extension and it will load automatically.

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4886946/jagten-en
THose English subs are FUCKING USELESS!!

@ Jespososo: Thanks.

@ rollacansada: are they not synced to this version?
I used the time and framerate synced to StyLishSaLH's version. You can advance or delay them in VLC. Tools > Track Synchronization > Subtitles/Video
